alert.note: Alert for Lake (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 25 at 7:29PM EDT until May 25 at 7:45PM EDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN LAKE COUNTY... At 629 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Highland, moving north at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hammond, Gary, Merrillville, East Chicago, Schererville, Hobart, Lansing, Highland, Munster, Griffith, Dyer, St. John, Lake Station, Lynwood and Whiting. This includes... Indiana University Northwest, Purdue University Northwest Hammond, Illiana Motor Speedway, and South Shore Rail Cats Baseball. Including the following interstates... Indiana I-80 between mile markers 1 and 12. Indiana I-90 between mile markers 3 and 18. Indiana I-65 between mile markers 252 and 261. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
